PackagingLine.description: A class that represents a packaging line.

SubMachines.description: Array of packaging machines in the packaging line.

ConveyorBelts.description: Array of conveyor belts in the packaging line.

SubMachine.description: A class that represents a sub-machine in a packaging line.

PackagingRobots.description: Array of packaging machines in the sub-machine.

Funnel.description: Boolean value that indicates if a funnel is attached to the sub-machine.

PackagingRobot.description: A class that represents a packaging robot in a sub-machine.

ConveyorBelt.description: A class that represents a conveyor belt in a packaging line.

beginning.description: Index of the first sub-machine the conveyor belt is connected to.

end.description: Index of the last sub-machine the conveyor belt is connected to.
